title: Building the Monkeyverse and Beyond with 100% On-Chain PFP OnChainMonkey
description: Kevin is joined by Danny Yang, CEO of OnChainMonkey, the first 100% on-chain PFP NFT collection. Here, they discuss OnChainMonkey's origin and evolution, doing well vs. doing good, community connection, and the upcoming Karma drop.
dc:creator: Kevin Rose
itunes:summary: Kevin is joined by Danny Yang, CEO of OnChainMonkey, the first 100% on-chain PFP NFT collection. Here, they discuss OnChainMonkey's origin and evolution, doing well vs. doing good, community connection, and the upcoming Karma drop.
